/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly beige and brown, punctuated by occasional windows that hint at the life within. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
